ygData.subject: Re: Fury
ygData.msgSnippet: Sinnertwin plodded towards Hun-grr. What? One head bellowed, the other was engulfed in some sort of rock on the ground, sniffing it.

Sinnertwin plodded towards Hun-grr. "What?" One head bellowed, the other
was engulfed in some sort of rock on the ground, sniffing it.
